AntisaursTTest <- function(data1, data2){
# 平均值(Mean)
mean_data1 <- mean(data1)
mean_data2 <- mean(data2)

#標準誤(SE)
se_data1 <- sd(data1) / sqrt(length(data1))
se_data2 <- sd(data2) / sqrt(length(data2))

df <- length(data1) + length(data2) - 2
